body.name: PAVOI 14K Gold Plated Croissant Dome Ring | Twisted Braided Gold Plated Ring | Chunky Signet Ring for Women
features: This 14K gold plated chunky ring featuring the croissant style domed twist is right on trend.
7mm wide, 3.7mm tall with a shank that tapers down to 3mm at the bottom, this chunky womens ring can be worn alone or as a stacking ring.

✦ 60-DAY GUARANTEE ✦ Your happiness is our number one priority. To ensure your complete satisfaction, we offer a hassle-free 60-Day money-back guarantee. To get in touch, email or chat with us - a member of our team will be happy to help you.

✦ SUSTAINABILITY ✦ PAVOI is dedicated to sustainability throughout our entire product cycle. Our jewelry is made from 100% recycled materials and we package in 99% recycled materials. We work to reduce our carbon emissions and offset plastic consumption by removing 275,000 bottles from oceans annually. We are committed to maintain a balanced and eco-friendly business that minimizes our environmental impact. Trust that PAVOI is continuously working towards a greener future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top notch styling
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the 14k gold plated ring. I read the reviews and I concur, it’s a great ring. I love knock off styles of this particular designer who is sooo expensive I can’t justify buying it for myself, never mind the thought of having it lost or stolen. This type of costume jewelry is right up my alley. I don’t have to worry about cost, insurance or expensive repairs. Although I do keep a few favorites as precious pieces - they are not worn around the clock and I’m careful not to shower or use powerful soaps/cleaners or lots of lotions when wearing them. Been doin this for years and get many compliments on them. So, I’m not sure about the 18k vermillion gold ring, but the 14k gold plated has two things I absolutely love: it’s a tapered ring where the back band sits minimally in your palm (which is much more comfortable for me). And, it’s very lightweight and not clunky and not too thin with a solid inner lining (which is rare, most inexpensive rings are hollow underneath). Recommend highly. Looks like real high quality crafted jewelry for sure at fraction of cost. And way better than most other knock off pieces I own. Lucky for you to come across these! Can’t find better in any local stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great jewelry piece
reviews.reviewText: I wear this ring almost every day. The sizing is spot on, and the quality is great! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars David yurman look alike!
reviews.reviewText: I have the real David yurman ring! And this one is just like their new one!!! Same vibe and very comfortable to wear! I have only worn it three times so idk about longevity of color. But so far it is great!!! Sooo worth it and looks very luxe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite ring!
reviews.reviewText: This ring goes with every outfit perfectly! I got the yellow gold version and it is definitely more yellow than gold. I do not sleep or shower with any rings on so mine is lasting a long time and not turning my fingers green or tarnishing; but just in case I lose it, I’m seriously considering getting the vermeil-plated version so that I always have a backup. Get it, you won’t regret it!UPDATE: I ended up ordering the vermeil-plated version so as to have a ring that will last longer, and while it is more of a golden tone than yellow like the plated version, it is also hollow! The plated (cheaper) version is solid and feels heftier. I am very disappointed that the more expensive vermeil version is hollow. It feels cheaper. Do yourself a favor and get the cheaper plated version, and just be sure to take it off before washing your hands so the plating lasts longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect everyday ring
reviews.reviewText: I am loving this gold everyday twist ring! It's the perfect blend of simplicity and elegance, making it an ideal accessory for daily wear. The twist design adds a subtle touch of uniqueness, and the gold finish gives it a timeless charm. The sizing is spot-on, and it's comfortable enough for all-day wear. If you're looking for a versatile and classy everyday ring, this gold twist design is a must-have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's cute but...
reviews.reviewText: This ring was so cute, it fit nicely and was a beautiful staple to my every day collection. Only downside is that it is starting to turn red and is tarnishing, but maybe it's because i'm wearing it daily (in the shower, to work, daily activities). Definitely take it off before doing things, it lasted a good time before it started tarnishing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far so good - no color change from original. Beautiful design. Very happy with the value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am in LOVE with this band. It is amazing quality and looks so gorgeous on the hand. I wear rose gold jewelry and this is a perfect addition

Honestly im surprised so far it did not tarnish and it has been 2 months now since i bought it. Been wearing it very often and doing everything with it. Its a pretty gold, not those brassy gold type of color. It shines very well. I got a few compliments on it as well.
Muy bonito y de buena calidad. Solo un poco grueso
Ordered the silver in and received the gold. Still very pretty ring ! Ordered for my upcoming vacation ! Still very happy with the quality and will continue to order from the company !

reviews.reviewerName: María Elizabeth León UribeMaría Elizabeth León Uribe
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Excelente, es hermoso y no se despinta a pesar de lavar las manos sin retirarlo parece de oro 100%. Este artículo es de mejor calidad que el mismo que había comprado anteriormente. Es muy lindo
I absolutely love this ring ! Would recommend anyone to get it
